landing.title: Welcome to Wit/Feeds
landing.description: Unlock the power of trustless data with Witnet Data Feeds — your gateway to real-time, tamper-proof price and real-world information on-chain. Seamlessly integrate decentralized oracles into your dApps with plug-and-play smart contract interfaces.

network_empty_state: No available feed found for this network!
ecosystem_empty_state: No available feeds found for this ecosystem!

data_feed_details.optimized_for_gas_cost: Optimized for gas cost and decentralization
data_feed_details.integration_details_description: Witnet price feeds can be integrated into your own {0} contracts in two different ways:
data_feed_details.feed_sources: The data was retrieved from {0} key sources:
data_feed_details.feed_description: This is a Witnet powered {name} data feed available on {network}. Last reported value is {value} (updated on {date}). This data feed is updated every {heartbeat}, or every time the price changes by more than {deviation}%.
data_feed_details.feed_description_routed: This is a Witnet powered {name} data feed available on {network}. Last reported value is {value} (updated on {date}). This data feed is updated as soon as any of the related data feeds update.
data_feed_details.feed_description_routed_cached: This is a Witnet powered {name} data feed available on {network}. Last reported value is {value} (updated on {date}). This data feed is updated every {heartbeat}, or every time any of the related data feeds update.

main.network_subtitle: Witnet data feeds currently available on

chart.heartbeat_text: The feed is updated before the heartbeat is reached
chart.deviation_text: When the price moves more than the deviation threshold, a data request is sent to the Witnet network to get an updated value

footer.ado_text: Witnet is part of the Alliance of Decentralized Oracles (ADO), a joint effort by leading decentralized oracle solutions to make the life of smart contract developers easier by creating oracle standards. Learn more about the ADO at {0}
